reviewText: It's perfect to lear how to touch people's heart with the hear tof God. You will lear and great choreography easily

This DVD is INCREDIBLE!  Pastor Lynn really outdone herself as she taught an anointed and ministering dance that literally gave me chills and tear filled eyes.  The song Melt My Heart speaks to the hearts of all who listen to it.  This amazing DVD is truly DIVINE!

The  Expressive Worship & Dance (Melt my Heart) DVD is a beautifully choreographed and danced piece.  The video with also provides the viewer with clear and concise step-by-step instructions with regards to learning the

This DVD is a wonderful learning tool for Ministry,  Melt My Heart is a beautiful song and Lynn has Choreographed a beautiful dance to it. If you are needing a heart felt dance to minister to your congregation then this is the perfect piece for you to learn, with step by step instructions.

Melt My Heart dance will really help you to break through all the garbage you have been holding onto.  When you dance or even just watch and do the dance in your head God will begin to take this off of you. Transforming you into a holy masterpiece; perfect and blameless in His sight.

This DVD presents and teaches a beautiful ministry piece to the song Melt My Heart.
Through dance they tell this story of a broken heart being taken up to heaven and restored and put back. It is just so beautiful.  Not only did I learn a dance, but I felt ministered too as well when watching and sure it would melt the hearts of viewers who watch this in a church or ministry setting. There is a lot you can use from this DVD even if you do not do the full dance;  beautiful moments or parts of the choreography can be incorporated into other dance or brought into our personal worship time with the LORD.
This DVD shows the dance with her team and then she teaches the dance step by step - you can use this in different situations because it is like a drama dance...........EXCELLENT!!!!
Absolutely beatiful dance. Pastor Lynn teaches the dance step by step.  Solo part and in the group great variarity of movements echo, trade lines and places,group shapes. You will enjoy this dvd

I loved the dance that Pastor Lynn teachers in this DVD. I have not done a group piece at my church yet and was not sure where to start. I am going to start with "Melt My Heart".  "Melt My Heart" is a great ministry piece that is also creative, beautiful and fun for a group to learn. Pastor Lynn is such a great teacher also!
